name:

Smart and stylish, simply throw on these co-ords to rock a casual day out with friends. It comes with beautiful shoulder straps and an attractive sleeveless design.

Trend Alert
Ethnic fusion tops are crop-length bra tops that are inspired by the rich heritage of India. They feature attractive details, like frills, tie-ups, volume sleeves, spaghetti straps, tiering, corset style, and so on. Prints and patterns, such as furnishing florals, quirky prints, ombre, Nu Boheme, embellished, sequined, embroidered, etc. make these ethnic fusion tops stand apart.
Size worn by the model: S
Chest: 32"
Waist: 26"
Hips: 35"
Height: 5'7''
Cotton Blend
Machine-wash
